name: RE: DOS - Trusted Center Tender - Total eBiz & Microsoft Connect
content:
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click on
links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content
is safe.




Hi Karthick and team,

 

I’ll be taking over from Vijay as your PTS in FY24 to support Total EBiz
Solutions.

Looking forward to your continuous support with Microsoft.

 

Do let me know if you have any urgent ask for help.

Meantime, I’ll sync with VJ on any outstanding items.

Apologizes that I couldn’t join you earlier call due to a conflicting appt.

 

Thanks,

Bryan

90700705

 

Note: If its urgent, pls text/reach me on my mobile instead of emails.

 

From: Karthickrajan Ramadass <Karthickrajan.R@totalebizsolutions.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 23, 2023 3:41 PM
To: Vijay Borkar <vijayborkar@microsoft.com>; Prasanna Nandhakumar
<pnandhakumar@microsoft.com>; Tan Kee Hwee Danny
<danny.tan@totalebizsolutions.com>; Govindarajan Ponnusamy
<Govinda.P@totalebizsolutions.com>; tamiliniyan.t
<tamiliniyan.t@totalebizsolutions.com>; Mavis Yee <yeemavis@microsoft.com>;
Chiang Wee Ee <cwee@microsoft.com>; Kok Wai Loke <Loke.KokWai@microsoft.com>;
Singh Neha <neha.singh@totalebizsolutions.com>; Kannan Alagu
<Kannan.A@totalebizsolutions.com>; Bryan Pang <Bryan.Pang@microsoft.com>
Cc: Kean Hin Gunn <khgunn@microsoft.com>; Karine Lim <Karine.Lim@microsoft.com>
Subject: [EXTERNAL] RE: DOS - Trusted Center Tender - Total eBiz & Microsoft
Connect

 

Hello Team-

Please find the DOS Azure Subscription IDs below.

 

DOS Azure PROD: 57e2995a-fa90-4200-a069-14bce15aacf0

DOS Azure UAT: 5ff0e821-6906-42d3-acc6-1e5167528060

 

Thanks.

 

Regards,

Karthick

 

-----Original Appointment-----
From: Vijay Borkar <vijayborkar@microsoft.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 20, 2023 11:30 AM
To: Vijay Borkar; Prasanna Nandhakumar; Tan Kee Hwee Danny; Govindarajan
Ponnusamy; Tamilselvam Tamiliniyan; Karthickrajan Ramadass; Mavis Yee; Chiang

Subject: DOS - Trusted Center Tender - Total eBiz & Microsoft Connect

Singapore.
Where: Microsoft Teams Meeting

 

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click on
links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content
is safe.

 

Hi Team,

 

Looping in @Bryan Pang [Bryan.Pang@microsoft.com] to takeover this call.

Hi @Bryan [Bryan.Pang@microsoft.com], enatailed meeting notes for your
reference.. will join the next call and I’ll bring you up to the speed.

 

Scheduling this call to have a quick sync-up on;

 

 1. Current Project Status
 2. Technical/Functional assistance required
 3. Any challenges achieving milestones
 4. Next Steps.
